Package boundary.usersBoundary

package boundary.usersBoundary
This package contains the boundary classes specific to the different user roles.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    boundary
    This package contains the boundary classes of the application.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ApplicantBoundary
    This boundary class handles interaction flows for BTO Applicants.
    BaseBoundary
    Abstract base class for all user role boundaries, providing common UI components and input handling.
    HdbManagerBoundary
    This boundary class handles interaction flows for HDB Managers.
    HdbOfficerBoundary
    This boundary class handles interaction flows for HDB Officers.
